caption.p: p-values obtained with Kruskal–Wallis rank sum test

fn.p: The three main lifestyle categories were tested against each toxin-related class. Number of TRGs per genome was normalized to the total gene count.

FL = free-living, Ext = extracellular host-associated, Int = intracellular host-associated, P = pathogen, NP = non-pathogen, B = found in biofilms, NB = not found in biofilms, df = degrees of freedom, TRG, toxin-related gene, MARTX, multifunctional autoprocessing RTX.
p-value was considered to be significant (p < 0.05).
